    • Uses of TradingTrajectory in org.drip.execution.optimum

      Subclasses of TradingTrajectory in org.drip.execution.optimum 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AC2000TradingTrajectory
      AC2000TradingTrajectory contains the Trading Trajectory generated by the Almgren and Chriss (2000) Scheme under the Criterion of No-Drift.
      class  AC2000TradingTrajectoryWithDrift
      AC2000TradingTrajectoryWithDrift contains the Trading Trajectory generated by the Almgren and Chriss (2000) Scheme under the Criterion of Non-zero Drift.
      class  Almgren2003TradingTrajectory
      Almgren2003TradingTrajectory contains the Trading Trajectory generated by the Almgren (2003) Scheme under the Criterion of No-Drift.
      class  ContinuousTradingTrajectory
      ContinuousTradingTrajectory contains the Trading Trajectory generated by one of the Methods outlined in the Almgren (2003) Scheme for Continuous Trading Approximation.
      class  EfficientTradingTrajectory
      EfficientTradingTrajectory contains the Trading Trajectory generated by a given Optimal Trajectory Generation Scheme.
      class  LinearTradingEnhancedTrajectory
      LinearTradingEnhancedTrajectory contains the Trading Trajectory generated by one of the Methods outlined in the Almgren (2003) Scheme for Continuous Trading Approximation for Linear Trading Enhanced Temporary Impact Volatility.
      Methods in org.drip.execution.optimum with parameters of type TradingTrajectory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static LinearTradingEnhancedTrajectory LinearTradingEnhancedTrajectory.Standard(TradingTrajectory tt, ArithmeticPriceEvolutionParameters apep, double dblCharacteristicTime, double dblCharacteristicSize)
      Construct a Standard LinearTradingEnhancedTrajectory Instance

    • Uses of TradingTrajectory in org.drip.execution.strategy

      Subclasses of TradingTrajectory in org.drip.execution.strategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MinimumImpactTradingTrajectory
      MinimumImpactTradingTrajectory holds the Trajectory of a Trading Block that is to be executed uniformly over Equal Intervals, the Idea being to minimize the Trading Impact.
      class  MinimumVarianceTradingTrajectory
      MinimumVarianceTradingTrajectory holds the Trajectory of a Trading Block that is to be executed in a Single Block, the Idea being to minimize the Trading Variance.
      Methods in org.drip.execution.strategy that return TradingTrajectory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TradingTrajectory TradingTrajectory.Linear(double[] adblExecutionTimeNode, double dblStartHoldings, double dblFinishHoldings)
      Construct a Linear TradingTrajectory Instance
      static TradingTrajectory TradingTrajectory.Standard(double[] adblExecutionTimeNode, double[] adblHoldings)
      Construct a Standard TradingTrajectory Instance
